data.title: Who Is Dick Van Dyke? Wiki, Age, Height, Wife, Net Worth, Ethnicity
data.meta_description:
Dick Van Dyke is a multi-talented American entertainer. He is a writer, actor, comedian, producer, singer, and dancer. Dick Van Dyke began his career doing stand-up comedy in clubs, then moved on to stage and theater work before landing on television.

data.text:
Publish date: 2024-07-01

Dick Van Dyke is a multi-talented American entertainer. He is a writer, actor, comedian, producer, singer, and dancer. Dick Van Dyke began his career doing stand-up comedy in clubs, then moved on to stage and theater work before landing on television.

Quick Facts

Celebrated Name:Dick Van DykeReal Name/Full Name:Richard Wayne Van DykeGender:MaleAge:96 years oldBirth Date:13 December 1925Birth Place:West Plains, Missouri, United StatesNationality:AmericanHeight:1.85 mWeight:82 kgSexual Orientation:StraightMarital Status:MarriedWife/Spouse (Name):Arlene Silver (m. 2012), Margie Willett (m. 1948â1984)Children:Yes ( Barry Van Dyke, Stacy Van Dyke, Christian Van Dyke, Carrie Beth van Dyke)Profession:American actor, comedian, writer, singer, and dancer,Net Worth in 2023:$55 million last

Dick Van Dyke Biography

Richard Wayne Van Dyke was born on December 13, 1925, in West Plains, Missouri, USA. His father, Loren Van Dyke, was a traveling salesman who died in 1976, and his mother, Hazel Van Dyke, was a teacher who died in 1992. Jerry Van Dyke, his brother, is an actor and comedian. Dick Van Dyke was born and raised in the Illinois town of Danville. Carey and Shane Van Dyke, both actors, are Dick Van Dykeâs grandsons. He went to Danville High School.

Dick Van Dyke Age, Height, Weight

Dick Van Dyke was born on December 13, 1925, and is 96 years old as of 2023. His height is 1.85 m, and he weighs 82 kg.

Career

During World War II, Dick Van Dyke left school to become a pilot for the United States Army Air Forces, but he was accepted as a radio announcer instead, and he later worked in Special Services entertainment. Before becoming an actor, he worked as a radio DJ and then went on a comedy tour with Phil Erickson, performing at nightclubs and touring across the country.

After many guest appearances and minor acting roles, as well as some stage work, Dick Van Dyke made his television debut in âThe Dick Van Dyke Show,â which aired on CBS from 1961 to 1966. After that, he had another self-titled show called âThe New Dick Van Dyke Show.â

The musical comedy âBye Bye Birdieâ is regarded as Dick Van Dykeâs debut film. He received numerous nominations and won an Academy Award for his performance in the musical fantasy film âMary Poppins.â Dick Van Dykeâs most recent long-running series was âDiagnosis Murder,â a comedy-mystery drama that aired on CBS from 1993 to 2001.

Dick Van Dykeâs 2017-2018 films include three comedies, âWait for Your Laugh,â âThe Dick Van Dyke Show: Now in Living Color!â and âCapture the Flag,â as well as a musical fantasy, âMary Poppins Returns,â a sequel to one of his earlier films. Dick Van Dyke released his debut album, âStep Back in Time,â in 2017.

Dick Van Dyke Achievements and Awards

Dick Van Dyke won three Primetime Emmy Awards for âThe Dick Van Dyke Show,â including two for Outstanding Lead Actor in a Comedy Series and one for Outstanding Comedy Series. He received the Primetime Emmy Award for Outstanding Variety Series and the Peopleâs Choice Award for Favorite Actor in a New TV Series for his work on âVan Dyke and Company.â Dick Van Dyke won the Grammy Award for Best Album for Children for his work on the film âMary Poppins.â

Dick Van Dykeâs Net Worth in 2023

Dick Van Dykeâs net worth is likely to be greater than $55 million as of December 2023. He amassed his fortune in the tens of millions of dollars by starring in TV movies and series for decades. Movies starring Dick Van Dyke have grossed millions of dollars at the box office, including âNight at the Museumâ and âDick Tracy.â Millions of people tuned in to watch his early self-titled shows on CBS.

Dick Van Dyke is a talented comedy actor who has appeared on television for decades. His first two films, âBye Bye Birdieâ and âMary Poppins,â were huge successes, and âMary Poppinsâ is getting a 2018 sequel. Dick Van Dyke is married to Arlene Silver, with whom he lives happily.

Dick Van Dyke Wife, Marriage

Dick Van Dykeâs first wife was Margie Willett. Their marriage was formed in 1948, and their divorce was finalized in 1984. Dick and Margie had two sons, Barry Van Dyke and Christian Van Dyke, and two daughters, Carrie Beth Van Dyke and Stacy Van Dyke. Margie Willett passed away in 2008.

In 2012, Dick Van Dyke married Arlene Silver. Dick Van Dyke lived with actress Michelle Triola between his first and second marriages until her death from lung cancer on October 30, 2009.
